item.title: 美国因乌克兰战争对俄罗斯实施全面制裁
item.description:
The United States on Tuesday imposed sanctions on hundreds of people and entities, including in China, Turkey and the United Arab Emirates, as it targets Russia's sanctions evasion, future energy capabilities, banks and its metals and mining sector.翻译:美国周二对包括中国、土耳其和阿拉伯联合酋长国在内的数百人和实体实施制裁，目标是俄罗斯逃避制裁、未来能源能力、银行及其金属和采矿业。

The U.S. Treasury and State departments targeted more than 250 individuals and entities in Washington's latest action attempting to crack down on Russia and its evasion of sanctions imposed by the U.S. and its allies over the war in Ukraine.翻译:在华盛顿试图打击俄罗斯及其逃避美国及其盟国因乌克兰战争而实施的制裁的最新行动中，美国财政部和国务院针对了超过250名个人和实体。

"We will continue to use the tools at our disposal to promote accountability for Russia’s crimes in Ukraine and those who finance and support Russia’s war machine," U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said in a statement.翻译:美国国务卿安东尼·布林肯在一份声明中表示：“我们将继续利用我们掌握的工具，追究俄罗斯在乌克兰所犯下的罪行以及那些资助和支持俄罗斯战争机器的人的责任。”

The Treasury said it imposed sanctions on a network of four entities and nine people based in China, Russia, Hong Kong and Pakistan over the facilitation and procurement of Chinese-manufactured weapons and technologies to Russia.翻译:美国财政部表示，由于为俄罗斯提供便利和采购中国制造的武器和技术，对位于中国、俄罗斯、香港和巴基斯坦的四个实体和九人网络实施了制裁。

It said the network sought to circumvent U.S. sanctions and Chinese controls on the export of military-related materials.翻译:据称，该网络试图规避美国的制裁和中国对军事相关材料出口的控制。

It also targeted Turkey, United Arab Emirates and China-based companies over the shipment of technology, equipment and inputs, including ball or roller bearings, aircraft parts and X-ray systems.翻译:它还针对土耳其、阿拉伯联合酋长国和中国公司运送技术、设备和投入，包括滚珠或滚柱轴承、飞机零部件和 X 射线系统。

The China-based firms targeted included commercial satellite imagery companies that Treasury said provided high-resolution observation imagery to Russian mercenary firm Wagner.翻译:被攻击的中国公司包括商业卫星图像公司，财政部称这些公司向俄罗斯雇佣军公司瓦格纳提供高分辨率观测图像。

The State Department also targeted Chinese entities in an action against a network it said was involved in procuring microelectronic components for Russian state conglomerate Rostec, which itself is under U.S. sanctions.翻译:美国国务院还针对中国实体采取了行动，打击一个据称参与为俄罗斯国有企业 Rostec 采购微电子元件的网络，而该企业本身也受到美国的制裁。

It said the microelectronics were being used to develop electronic warfare systems. Companies in Russia, Turkey and Hong Kong were also targeted as part of action against the network.翻译:据称，微电子技术正被用于开发电子战系统。俄罗斯、土耳其和香港的公司也成为针对该网络的行动的目标。

Washington has stepped up diplomatic pressure on countries and private companies globally to ensure enforcement of the sanctions it, the European Union and other Western nations have imposed on Moscow over its invasion of Ukraine.翻译:华盛顿加大了对全球各国和私营企业的外交压力，以确保其、欧盟和其他西方国家因莫斯科入侵乌克兰而对其实施的制裁得到执行。

Russia and China's embassies in Washington did not immediately respond to requests for comment. Russia dismisses Western sanctions as illegal, and says they will not impede the development of its economy.翻译:俄罗斯和中国驻华盛顿大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。俄罗斯认为西方制裁是非法的，并表示这些制裁不会阻碍其经济发展。

UAE's embassy did not immediately respond to a request for comment. Its foreign ministry did not immediately reply to a request outside usual working hours.

FUTURE ENERGY

The U.S. targeted three companies developing the Ust-Luga liquefied natural gas (LNG) terminal, a facility at a Baltic seaport in northwest Russia to be operated by Gazprom and RusGazDobycha.翻译:美国瞄准了三家开发乌斯季卢加液化天然气（LNG）终端的公司，该终端位于俄罗斯西北部波罗的海港口，由俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom）和俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（RusGazDobycha）运营。

The yet-to-be-built complex is part of Gazprom's strategy to shift focus to processing and is poised to become Russia's largest gas processing plant, and one of the world's largest in terms of production volumes.翻译:这座尚未建成的综合设施是俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司将重点转向加工战略的一部分，有望成为俄罗斯最大的天然气加工厂，也是世界上产量最大的天然气加工厂之一。

The sanctions were put on Russian-based companies Limited Liability Company Northern Technologies, Joint Stock Company Kazan Compressor Machinery Plant, and Limited Liability Company Gazprom Linde Engineering.翻译:制裁对象为俄罗斯有限责任公司北方技术公司、股份公司喀山压缩机机械厂和有限责任公司俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司林德工程公司。

Washington is seeking to interfere with Russia's future energy production and fuel export capacity.翻译:华盛顿正在寻求干预俄罗斯未来的能源生产和燃料出口能力。

The move came a little over a month after Washington put sanctions on an entity developing another LNG project, Arctic-2 LNG in Siberia.翻译:一个月多前，华盛顿对开发另一个液化天然气项目（位于西伯利亚的 Arctic-2 液化天然气）的实体实施制裁。

It was not immediately clear how Russia's future LNG exports would be affected. The U.S. is the world's largest LNG exporter.翻译:目前尚不清楚俄罗斯未来的液化天然气出口将如何受到影响。美国是全球最大的液化天然气出口国。

German company Linde (LIN.DE) stopped work at Ust-Luga in 2022 due to Western sanctions. This year Russia has been talking with China to involve Chinese companies in construction of the plant.翻译:由于西方制裁，德国林德公司(LIN.DE)于 2022 年停止了 Ust-Luga 的工作。今年，俄罗斯一直在与中国谈判，让中国公司参与该工厂的建设。

Gazprom did not immediately reply to a request for comment.翻译:俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司没有立即回复置评请求。

The State Department also targeted Russian businessman Vladislav Sviblov and Highland Gold Mining Ltd, a UK-registered company owned and controlled by him that it said is Russia’s seventh-largest gold producer, as well as other companies connected to Sviblov following action Britain took in November.翻译:英国去年 11 月采取行动后，美国国务院还针对俄罗斯商人弗拉迪斯拉夫·斯维布洛夫 (Vladislav Sviblov) 和他拥有并控制的一家在英国注册的公司高地黄金矿业有限公司 (Highland Gold Mining Ltd) 以及与斯维布洛夫有关联的其他公司（据说是俄罗斯第七大黄金生产商）。 。

A representative for Sviblov declined to comment.翻译:斯维布洛夫的代表拒绝发表评论。

The State Department also designated three shipping companies and three Russian-flagged commercial vessels it said have been used to transfer munitions between North Korea and Russia.翻译:美国国务院还指定了三家航运公司和三艘悬挂俄罗斯国旗的商船，据称这些商船曾被用来在朝鲜和俄罗斯之间转运弹药。

North Korea's mission to the United Nations in New York did not immediately reply to a request for comment.翻译:朝鲜驻纽约联合国代表团没有立即回复置评请求。

Washington also targeted four Russian financial institutions - including Expobank, the proposed buyer of HSBC's Russian business - and dozens of Russia-based entities involved in the import, production, modification and sale of defense-related and industrial technology, including drones.翻译:华盛顿还针对四家俄罗斯金融机构（包括汇丰银行俄罗斯业务的拟议买家Expobank ）以及数十家涉及国防相关技术和工业技术（包括无人机）进口、生产、改造和销售的俄罗斯实体。

The State Department also listed former telecoms CEO Ivan Tavrin and a network of companies he runs. It said Tavrin "has become one of Russia’s biggest wartime dealmakers since the beginning of Russia’s illegal war against Ukraine."翻译:美国国务院还列出了前电信首席执行官伊万·塔夫林 (Ivan Tavrin) 和他经营的公司网络。报告称，塔夫林“自俄罗斯对乌克兰发动非法战争以来，已成为俄罗斯最大的战时交易撮合者之一”。

A representative for Kismet, owned by Tavrin, did not immediately respond to a request for comment on the sanctions. New Towers, one of the companies in Tavrin's empire, declined to comment.翻译:塔夫林旗下 Kismet 的一名代表没有立即回应就制裁发表评论的请求。塔夫林帝国的公司之一新塔拒绝置评。

Reporting by Daphne Psaledakis, Simon Lewis, Timothy Gardner, Michael Martina, Susan Heavey and Doina Chiacu in Washington, Vladimir Soldatkin in Moscow, Alexander Marrow in London and Maha El Dahan in Dubai; Editing by Daniel Wallis翻译:华盛顿的 Daphne Psaledakis、Simon Lewis、Timothy Gardner、Michael Martina、Susan Heavey 和 Doina Chiacu、莫斯科的 Vladimir Soldatkin、伦敦的 Alexander Marrow 和迪拜的 Maha El Dahan 进行报道；丹尼尔·沃利斯编辑

item.title: 巴基斯坦针对安全部队的重大袭击
item.description:
A six-man suicide squad drove an explosive-laden truck into a military camp in northwest Pakistan on Tuesday, killing at least 23 soldiers, in the latest attack on security forces in the South Asian nation.翻译:周二，一支六人自杀小队驾驶一辆满载炸药的卡车冲入巴基斯坦西北部的一个军营，造成至少 23 名士兵死亡，这是对这个南亚国家安全部队的最新袭击。

Here are some other incidents of violence over recent years that have targeted security forces in the country.

AUGUST, 2023

Militants attacked a Pakistani military convoy near the strategic southwestern port of Gwadar in the country's mineral-rich province of Balochistan while it was escorting a delegation of Chinese nationals to a construction project.翻译:武装分子在该国矿产资源丰富的俾路支省西南战略港口瓜达尔附近袭击了一支巴基斯坦军事车队，当时该车队正在护送一个中国公民代表团前往一个建设项目。

A separatist group, the Balochistan Liberation Army (BLA), claimed the attack and said it had inflicted multiple casualties, but Pakistani officials said no harm had been caused to any military personnel or civilians.

JULY 2023

Suspected Islamist militants stormed into an army base in Balochistan's Zhob district, armed with guns, hand grenades, and rockets, in an attack that caused the deaths of nine soldiers.翻译:疑似伊斯兰武装分子携带枪支、手榴弹和火箭冲进俾路支省佐布地区的一个军事基地，袭击造成 9 名士兵死亡。

Newly founded jihadist group Tehreek-e-Jihad Pakistan (TJP) claimed responsibility for the assault.

APRIL, 2023

A suicide bomber on a motorcycle blew himself up, killing three soldiers, as militants attacked a temporary military camp in northwest Pakistan.翻译:当武装分子袭击巴基斯坦西北部的一个临时军营时，一名骑摩托车的自杀式炸弹袭击者引爆了身上的炸弹，造成三名士兵死亡。

The attack, for which no group claimed responsibility, occurred in the district of Lakki Marwat, near a rugged tribal area bordering Afghanistan which has long been home to Islamist militants.

MARCH, 2023

A suicide bomber rammed a motorcycle into a police truck in Sibbi, a city some 160 km (100 miles) east of Quetta, provincial capital of Balochistan, killing nine policemen and injuring 15 more.翻译:俾路支省首府奎达以东约 160 公里（100 英里）处的锡比市，一名自杀式炸弹袭击者用一辆摩托车撞上一辆警车，造成 9 名警察死亡，另有 15 人受伤。

The Islamic State later claimed responsibility for the attack.

FEBRUARY, 2022

Insurgents armed with bombs and guns attacked two Pakistani military bases in Balochistan, killing seven soldiers in an attack for which the BLA group claimed responsibility.翻译:武装分子携带炸弹和枪支袭击了俾路支省的两个巴基斯坦军事基地，造成 7 名士兵死亡，BLA 组织声称对此次袭击负责。

China has been investing in the region and the attack came hours before Pakistan's then-Prime Minister Imran Khan arrived in Beijing for the opening of the Winter Olympics, where he was due to meet Chinese President Xi Jinping and other leaders.

JANUARY, 2022

An insurgency attack on a Pakistani army post near Gwadar port killed 10 soldiers. The BLF claimed responsibility for the attack.翻译:瓜达尔港附近的巴基斯坦军队哨所遭到叛乱分子袭击，造成 10 名士兵死亡。 BLF 声称对此次袭击负责。

Reporting by Kanjyik Ghosh Editing by Gareth Jones翻译:坎吉克·戈什 (Kanjyik Ghosh) 报道 加雷斯·琼斯 (Gareth Jones) 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国本周将迎来严寒天气
item.description:
Chinese authorities warned on Tuesday of heavy snowfall, blizzards and plunging temperatures this week in most parts of the country in what could be one of the coldest December snaps in China in decades.翻译:中国当局周二警告称，本周中国大部分地区将出现大雪、暴风雪和气温骤降，这可能是中国数十年来最冷的12月天气之一。

Beijing is expected to be hit by temperatures as low as minus 18 Celsius (minus 0.4 Fahrenheit) this weekend compared to around minus 8C (17.6F) on average in mid-December. Even Shanghai in the south could be buffeted by weather as frigid as minus 4C (24.8F) on Saturday through Sunday, unusual for this time of the year.翻译:预计本周末北京气温将低至-18摄氏度（-0.4华氏度），而12月中旬的平均气温约为-8摄氏度（17.6华氏度）。即使是南方的上海，周六至周日也可能会受到零下 4 摄氏度（24.8 华氏度）的寒冷天气的影响，这在一年中的这个时候是不寻常的。

Parts of north, northwest and south China, as well as parts of the Inner Mongolia region, Guizhou province and even regions south of the Yangtze River, could see temperatures slide by more than 14 degrees Celsius, the National Meteorological Center (NMC) cautioned.翻译:国家气象中心警告，华北、西北、华南部分地区以及内蒙古地区、贵州省乃至长江以南地区的部分地区气温可能下降14摄氏度以上。

It has called on local governments to take precautions against the cold weather, advised the public to keep warm, and urged measures to be taken to protect tropical crops and aquatic produce.翻译:它呼吁地方政府做好防寒措施，建议公众注意保暖，并敦促采取措施保护热带作物和水产品。

Many rivers in Heilongjiang, a vast northeastern province that shares a border with Russia, have already frozen over.翻译:黑龙江是一个与俄罗斯接壤的东北大省，许多河流已经结冰。

Also on Tuesday, the China Meteorological Administration activated a Level-II emergency response - its second-highest emergency response level - for the cold wave and blizzards.翻译:同样在周二，中国气象局针对寒潮和暴风雪启动了二级应急响应，这是其第二高应急响应级别。

In Beijing, more than 6,000 people have been put on call for any road emergency rescues and 2,200 sets of snow-removal equipment and machinery are on standby for deployment.翻译:北京目前已投入道路应急救援6000余人，2200台套除雪设备机械待命部署。

Additionally, 32,000 tonnes of snow-thawing agent is ready for use on icy roads and motorways.翻译:此外，还有 32,000 吨融雪剂可供在结冰的道路和高速公路上使用。

The Chinese capital last saw such cold weather on Jan. 7, 2021, when the temperature fell to minus 19.6C (minus 3.3F).翻译:中国首都上次出现如此寒冷的天气是在2021年1月7日，当时气温降至-19.6C（-3.3F）。

The cold snap in Beijing this week, compared with the autumn-like conditions a week ago, reflects the sharp oscillations in temperatures recently. In October, Beijing experienced one of its warmest Octobers in decades in a year of weather extremes.翻译:与一周前的秋意相比，本周北京的寒流反映出近期气温的剧烈波动。十月，北京经历了几十年来最温暖的十月之一，也是极端天气的一年。

Beijing's all-time low temperature was minus 27.4°C (minus 17.3F), set on Feb. 22, 1966.翻译:1966年2月22日，北京的历史最低气温为-27.4°C（-17.3F）。

Reporting by Ryan Woo Editing by Frances Kerry翻译:瑞安·吴 (Ryan Woo) 报道 弗朗西斯·克里 (Frances Kerry) 编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 越南加强对华关系，继美国升级“竹子外交”后
item.description:
Summary:
  • Xi embarked on first Vietnam trip in six years
  • China, Vietnam committed to "shared future"
  • Sign deals on railways, telecoms, but not on rare earths
翻译:概括：
  • 习近平六年来首次越南之行
  • 中越致力于“命运共同体”
  • 签署铁路、电信协议，但不签署稀土协议

Communist-ruled China and Vietnam, at odds over claims in the South China Sea, agreed on Tuesday to boost ties and build a community with a "shared future", three months after Hanoi upgraded its formal relations with the United States.翻译:在河内升级与美国的正式关系三个月后，共产党统治的中国和越南在南海主权问题上存在分歧，两国同意加强关系并建立“命运共同体”。

On Chinese President Xi Jinping's first visit to Hanoi in six years, the two countries announced 37 deals, including on diplomatic ties, railways and telecommunications.翻译:在中国国家主席习近平六年来首次访问河内之际，两国宣布了 37 项协议，包括外交关系、铁路和电信等领域。

As China and the United States vie for influence in the strategic nation, the agreements mark an achievement of Vietnam's "Bamboo diplomacy", although analysts and diplomats said the improvement in relations could be more symbolic than real.翻译:随着中国和美国争夺在这个战略国家的影响力，这些协议标志着越南“竹子外交”的成就，尽管分析人士和外交官表示，关系的改善可能更具象征意义，而不是实际意义。

Vietnam agreed to "support the initiative of building a community of shared future for human kind", according to a joint statement shown to reporters on Tuesday, after sources said China had been pushing for it. The joint statement is expected to be formally signed on Wednesday.翻译:周二向记者展示的一份联合声明显示，越南同意“支持构建人类命运共同体的倡议”，此前消息人士称，中国一直在推动这一倡议。联合声明预计将于周三正式签署。

The countries' diplomats had debated the "shared future" phrase for months, following Hanoi's initial reluctance to use it, say officials and diplomats.翻译:官员和外交官表示，在河内最初不愿使用“共同未来”这个词之后，两国外交官已经争论了几个月。

The Chinese term literally means "common destiny", but its translation in English and Vietnamese is "common future", which may be seen as less demanding.翻译:中文的字面意思是“共同的命运”，但其英语和越南语的翻译是“共同的未来”，可能会被认为要求不那么高。

"One declaration, many translations," said a diplomat based in the Vietnamese capital, commenting on the interpretation of the term.翻译:“一份声明，多种翻译，”一位驻越南首都的外交官在评论该术语的解释时说道。

In diplomatic ties, the upgrade is symbolic, Le Hong Hiep, a specialist in Vietnamese strategic and political issues at Singapore's Iseas–Yusof Ishak Institute, said.翻译:新加坡尤索夫伊萨研究所越南战略和政治问题专家黎宏协表示，在外交关系中，升级具有象征意义。

"Vietnam's mistrust of China runs deep, and from the Vietnamese people's viewpoint, there is little to no 'shared destiny' between the two countries, as long as China continues to claim most of the South China Sea," he said.翻译:他说：“越南对中国的不信任根深蒂固，从越南人民的角度来看，只要中国继续对南海大部分地区拥有主权，两国之间就几乎没有‘共同命运’。”

Despite close economic ties, the neighbours have been at odds over boundaries in the South China Sea and have a millennia-long history of conflict.翻译:尽管经济关系密切，但两国在南海边界问题上一直存在分歧，冲突历史已有数千年。

In a sign of possible de-escalation, however, they signed two cooperation agreements for joint patrols in the Tonkin Gulf in the South China Sea and to establish a hotline to handle fisheries incidents, according to one of the agreements.

RAILWAYS, DIGITAL SILK ROAD

Apart from taking ties to a level Beijing may consider above those with the United States, the upgraded status came with the announcement of 36 cooperation deals, according to a list of documents seen by Reuters, and the joint statement on diplomatic ties.翻译:根据路透社看到的文件清单和外交关系联合声明，除了将双边关系提升到北京可能考虑的高于与美国的水平之外，升级的地位还伴随着宣布的 36 项合作协议。

That was short of 45 initially proposed, according to one Vietnamese official, and missed agreements on critical minerals and rare earths on which Xi had urged more cooperation in an opinion piece published on Tuesday in a Vietnamese state newspaper.翻译:一名越南官员称，这一数字比最初提议的 45 项要少，而且未能就关键矿产和稀土达成一致，而习近平在周二在越南官方报纸上发表的一篇评论文章中敦促加强合作。

Deals included two memoranda of understanding on cross-border rail development, including one mentioning developing aid.翻译:交易包括两份关于跨境铁路发展的谅解备忘录，其中一份提到发展援助。

Top officials in both countries had urged a boost to a rail link between the southern Chinese city of Kunming and the northern Vietnamese port of Haiphong, which crosses regions in Vietnam rich in rare earths.翻译:两国高级官员都敦促加强中国南部城市昆明和越南北部港口海防之间的铁路连接，该铁路穿越越南富含稀土的地区。

China's ambassador to Vietnam Xiong Bo said earlier this week Beijing was ready to offer grants to develop rail connections, though the volume and terms of possible loans are unclear.翻译:中国驻越南大使熊波本周早些时候表示，北京准备提供赠款以发展铁路连接，但可能提供的贷款数量和条款尚不清楚。

Boosting transport links would allow Vietnam to export more to China, especially farm products, while Beijing wants to further integrate the country's north with its southern supply chain networks, where Chinese firms are moving some operations.翻译:加强运输联系将使越南能够向中国出口更多产品，特别是农产品，而北京方面希望进一步整合该国北部与南部的供应链网络，中国公司正在将一些业务转移到那里。

Stronger rail networks would speed the import of components from China for assembly in Vietnam, effectively expanding China's Belt and Road Initiative (BRI).翻译:更强大的铁路网络将加快从中国进口零部件并在越南组装的速度，从而有效扩大中国的“一带一路”倡议（BRI）。

So far the Hanoi metro is Vietnam's only project to have received BRI loans and it has not been labelled as part of the initiative, as the country's leaders often grapple with widespread anti-Chinese sentiment.翻译:到目前为止，河内地铁是越南唯一获得“一带一路”贷款的项目，但由于该国领导人经常应对广泛的反华情绪，该项目并未被视为该倡议的一部分。

The two countries agreed to jointly promote the "two corridors, one belt" initiative, which is the Vietnamese term for infrastructure projects supported by China.翻译:两国同意共同推进“两廊一带”倡议，这是越南对中国支持的基础设施项目的称呼。

Xi's visit is also expected to boost plans on what is known as the Digital Silk Road, and the two countries signed several deals to cooperate on telecommunications and the digital economy.翻译:预计习近平的访问还将推动数字丝绸之路的计划，两国签署了多项电信和数字经济合作协议。

The content of the agreements is not known but officials had said the increased telecoms cooperation could include digital infrastructure such as 5G networks and undersea optical fibre cables.翻译:这些协议的内容尚不清楚，但官员们表示，增加的电信合作可能包括 5G 网络和海底光缆等数字基础设施。

Reporting by Francesco Guarascio @fraguarascio; Additional reporting by Khanh Vu and Phuong Nguyen in Hanoi; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Clarence Fernandez and Barbara Lewis翻译:Francesco Guarascio@fraguarascio 报道； Khanh Vu 和 Phuong Nguyen 在河内的补充报道；林肯·费斯特 (Lincoln Feast)、克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯 (Clarence Fernandez) 和芭芭拉·刘易斯 (Barbara Lewis) 编辑

item.title: 11 月份全球电动汽车销量创下新纪录 - Rho Motion
item.description:
Global sales of battery electric vehicles (BEV) and plug-in hybrids (PHEV) rose 20% versus a year ago as strong growth in North America and China offset lower sales in Europe, according to market research firm Rho Motion.翻译:市场研究公司 Rho Motion 的数据显示，由于北美和中国的强劲增长抵消了欧洲销量的下降，纯电动汽车 (BEV) 和插电式混合动力汽车 (PHEV) 的全球销量同比增长 20%。

Sales of BEVs and PHEVs hit a fresh monthly record of 1.4 million units, up from 1.1 million in November 2022.翻译:BEV 和 PHEV 的销量创下 140 万辆的新月度纪录，高于 2022 年 11 月的 110 万辆。

"Sales have continued to rise despite a lot of negative sentiment in the market and we're expecting sales to remain strong in December," data manager Charles Lester told Reuters.翻译:数据经理查尔斯·莱斯特 (Charles Lester) 告诉路透社：“尽管市场存在很多负面情绪，但销售额仍在继续增长，我们预计 12 月份的销售额将保持强劲。”

After years of accelerating growth, some automakers fear that electric car sales in Europe and elsewhere could be heading for slowing demand as drivers wait for better, cheaper models that are two to three years down the road.翻译:经过多年的加速增长，一些汽车制造商担心，欧洲和其他地区的电动汽车销售可能会导致需求放缓，因为司机们正在等待两到三年后更好、更便宜的车型。

Globally, BEVs made up 70% of sales and PHEVs made up the remaining 30% in November, Rho Motion said.翻译:Rho Motion 表示，从全球来看，11 月份纯电动汽车占销量的 70%，插电式混合动力汽车占剩余的 30%。

China posted a 25% increase in sales and were up 43% in the United States and Canada, while Europe saw sales drop 3% versus the same month in 2022.翻译:中国的销售额增长了 25%，美国和加拿大的销售额增长了 43%，而欧洲的销售额与 2022 年同月相比下降了 3%。

The drop in Europe reflects a strong end of the year in 2022 as Germans bought electric cars before a reduction in government subsidies kicked in, Rho Motion said.翻译:Rho Motion 表示，欧洲的下降反映了 2022 年年底的强劲表现，因为德国人在政府补贴减少之前购买了电动汽车。

Lester said that as Germany is reducing its BEV subsidies and France is narrowing its own subsidies - to favour European-made electric cars over Chinese ones - sales in Europe should remain strong because automakers will still need to meet emissions targets heading into 2025.翻译:莱斯特表示，随着德国正在减少纯电动汽车补贴，法国也在缩小自己的补贴范围——以青睐欧洲制造的电动汽车而不是中国制造的电动汽车——欧洲的销售应该会保持强劲，因为汽车制造商在 2025 年之前仍需要实现排放目标。

He added that France's targeted subsidies are "going to have a bigger impact" on vehicles like Renault's (RENA.PA) Dacia Spring, which is made in China for the European market than on China's BYD (002594.SZ), because BYD cars "are only just starting to be sold" in France.翻译:他补充说，法国的定向补贴对雷诺（RENA.PA） Dacia Spring等在中国为欧洲市场制造的汽车“将产生比对中国比亚迪（002594.SZ）更大的影响”，因为比亚迪汽车“才刚刚开始在法国销售”。

Reporting By Nick Carey; Editing by Sharon Singleton翻译:尼克·凯里报道；莎朗·辛格尔顿编辑
item.author: Nick Carey

item.title: 芬兰警告俄罗斯与中国、伊朗和朝鲜的联系构成威胁
item.description:
Russia's increasing cooperation with China, Iran, North Korea and its other global allies is a serious, long-term threat to European countries, Finland's Defence Minister Antti Hakkanen said on Tuesday.翻译:芬兰国防部长安蒂·哈卡宁周二表示，俄罗斯与中国、伊朗、朝鲜及其其他全球盟友日益加强的合作对欧洲国家构成严重的长期威胁。

Finland and Estonia are investigating the destruction in October of the Balticconnector gas pipeline and telecom cables on the Baltic seabed and have named a Hong Kong registered container vessel as their main suspect for the damage.翻译:芬兰和爱沙尼亚正在调查 10 月份波罗的海海底的 Balticconnector 天然气管道和电信电缆遭到破坏的事件，并已将一艘香港注册的集装箱船列为此次破坏的主要嫌疑人。

"While these issues are not public, what Russia does at the moment together with China, Iran, North Korea and its other allies, also from the global south, constitutes a very serious prospect in the long term," Hakkanen said in a speech.翻译:哈卡宁在一次演讲中表示：“虽然这些问题并未公开，但俄罗斯目前与中国、伊朗、朝鲜及其其他来自南半球的盟友所做的事情，从长远来看构成了一个非常严峻的前景。”

As the NATO military alliance's newest member, which shares a 1,340-km (830-mile) border with Russia, Finland and its intelligence services are monitoring Russia's action globally, Hakkanen said.翻译:哈卡宁说，作为北约军事联盟的最新成员，芬兰与俄罗斯有着 1,340 公里（830 英里）的边界，其情报部门正在监视俄罗斯在全球的行动。

He called Russia's new cooperation with its global allies "a weather system of security policy that is unfortunately troublesome".翻译:他称俄罗斯与其全球盟友的新合作是“不幸的是，这是一个麻烦的安全政策天气系统”。

Reporting by Anne Kauranen; editing by Barbara Lewis翻译:安妮·考拉宁报道；芭芭拉·刘易斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 韩国敦促俄罗斯帮助制裁朝鲜卫星和劳动力出口
item.description:
Russia should help impose new sanctions against North Korea over its recent launch of a spy satellite and enforce existing bans on the isolated country's labour exports, a senior South Korean official said on Tuesday.翻译:韩国一名高级官员周二表示，俄罗斯应帮助对朝鲜最近发射间谍卫星实施新的制裁，并执行针对该孤立国家劳动力出口的现有禁令。

South Korea's unification minister Kim Yung-ho, in charge of inter-Korean ties, said last month's satellite launch violated U.N. Security Council resolutions banning North Korea's use of ballistic technology, but Russia has been "extremely passive" in further sanctioning Pyongyang.翻译:韩国负责朝韩关系的统一部长金永浩表示，上个月的卫星发射违反了联合国安理会禁止朝鲜使用弹道技术的决议，但俄罗斯在进一步制裁平壤方面一直“极其被动”。

There are "clear signs" of military cooperation between Pyongyang and Moscow, and Seoul is also looking into whether Russia has accepted more North Korean workers in defiance of U.N. resolutions, Kim said.翻译:金说，平壤和莫斯科之间存在军事合作的“明显迹象”，首尔也在调查俄罗斯是否无视联合国决议，接受了更多朝鲜工人。

"As a permanent member of the Security Council, Russia has responsibility to faithfully implement its sanctions resolutions," he told a news conference.翻译:他在新闻发布会上表示：“作为安理会常任理事国，俄罗斯有责任忠实执行制裁决议。”

South Korea's intelligence agency said last month the North had received Russian aid for the satellite launch, which was its third attempt after two failed tries.翻译:韩国情报机构上个月表示，朝鲜在卫星发射方面获得了俄罗斯的援助，这是朝鲜在两次失败后的第三次尝试。

Following leader Kim Jong Un's rare trip to Russia in September, North Korea has sent hundreds of construction and other workers to the Russian Far East to earn foreign currency, South Korea's Donga Ilbo newspaper reported on Tuesday, citing unidentified government officials.翻译:韩国《东亚日报》周二援引身份不明的政府官员的话报道称，继领导人金正恩九月份罕见地访问俄罗斯之后，朝鲜已向俄罗斯远东地区派遣了数百名建筑工人和其他工人以赚取外汇。

Minister Kim also urged China to play a better role in sanctioning North Korea over its weapons development, and complying with international norms not to forcibly repatriate North Korean defectors.翻译:金部长还敦促中国在制裁朝鲜武器开发方面发挥更好的作用，并遵守不强行遣返脱北者的国际准则。

South Korean activists said last week that up to 600 North Koreans have "vanished" after being deported by China in October, in what could be the largest such mass repatriation in years.翻译:韩国活动人士上周表示，多达 600 名朝鲜人在 10 月份被中国驱逐出境后“ 消失”，这可能是多年来最大规模的大规模遣返行动。

Kim also said the increasing public appearances and levels of protocol for Kim Ju Ae, the daughter of North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, could be aimed at laying groundwork for a future succession.翻译:金正恩还表示，朝鲜领导人金正恩之女金珠爱的公开露面和礼节程度不断提高，可能是为了为未来的继任奠定基础。

Since her debut in November 2022, she has appeared in state media 19 times, mostly accompanying her father at military events, he said.翻译:他说，自 2022 年 11 月首次亮相以来，她已 19 次出现在官方媒体上，主要是陪同父亲参加军事活动。

"The possibility of her becoming a successor cannot be ruled out," Kim said. "By putting her on the public stage early, they might be trying to show their resolve for a fourth generation hereditary succession."翻译:“不能排除她成为继任者的可能性，”金说。 “通过让她尽早登上公共舞台，他们可能试图表明他们对第四代世袭继承的决心。”

Reporting by Hyonhee Shin; Editing by Kim Coghill翻译:申贤熙报道；编辑：金·科吉尔
item.author: Hyonhee Shin

item.title: 中国碧桂园交易后或可避免人民币债券违约 - 彭博新闻
item.description:
China's Country Garden Holdings (2007.HK) is likely to avoid its first default on yuan bonds after most holders of a local note agreed not to demand repayment this week, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:据彭博社周二援引知情人士的话报道，中国碧桂园控股公司（2007.HK）可能会避免首次人民币债券违约，因为大多数本地票据持有人本周同意不要求偿还。

Reporting by Gnaneshwar Rajan in Bengaluru; Editing by Christian Schmollinger翻译:Gnaneshwar Rajan 班加罗尔报道；克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中方乐见缅甸冲突各方举行和谈 - 中国外交部
item.description:
China is happy to see parties to the Myanmar conflict hold peace talks and is willing to provide further support, the Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday.翻译:中国外交部周二表示，中方乐见缅甸冲突各方举行和谈，愿提供进一步支持。

Representatives from Myanmar's ruling military have held talks, facilitated by China, state media reported Myanmar’s ruling military spokesperson as saying on Monday.翻译:据官方媒体报道，缅甸执政军方发言人周一表示，缅甸执政军方代表在中国的推动下举行了会谈。

It was unclear when or where the meeting took place and the spokesman did not elaborate on what was discussed.翻译:目前尚不清楚会议何时何地举行，发言人也没有详细说明讨论的内容。

"We believe that the easing of the situation in northern Myanmar is in the interests of all parties and conducive to peace and stability in the China-Myanmar border area," said foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁表示，我们认为缅北局势的缓和符合各方利益，有利于中缅边境地区的和平稳定。

"China is happy to see the parties to the conflict in northern Myanmar hold peace talks and achieve positive results, and we are ready to continue to provide support and facilitation to this end."翻译:中方乐见缅北冲突各方举行和谈并取得积极成果，愿继续为此提供支持和便利。

Myanmar's military is battling armed opponents on several fronts, in the fiercest challenge to its grip on the Southeast Asian country since it seized power from an elected government in a 2021 coup.翻译:缅甸军方正在多条战线上与武装反对派作战，这是自 2021 年政变中从民选政府手中夺取政权以来，对其对这个东南亚国家控制力的最激烈挑战。

A rebel alliance has overrun parts of northern Myanmar, including areas bordering China. The fiercest fighting has been near Myanmar's border with China in northern Shan state.翻译:叛军联盟已经占领了缅甸北部部分地区，包括与中国接壤的地区。最激烈的战斗发生在缅甸掸邦北部与中国边境附近。

China has continuously urged the conflict to end, while urging Chinese nationals to vacate areas of danger. It had also sent a government official there recently to urge Myanmar to take measures to strengthen the security and safety for Chinese institutions, personnel and of China-Myanmar co-operation projects.翻译:中国不断敦促停止冲突，同时敦促中国公民撤离危险地区。近期还派政府官员赴缅方敦促缅方采取措施，加强中方机构、人员和中缅合作项目的安全保障。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom; Writing by Bernard Orr; Editing by Tom Hogue and Michael Perry翻译:北京新闻编辑室报道；伯纳德·奥尔撰写；汤姆·霍格和迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾就南海“骚扰”召见中国大使
item.description:
Summary:
  • Philippines calls China actions a 'serious escalation'
  • US, UK condemn China's ramming and water cannon damage to Philippine vessels
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾称中国行动“严重升级”
  • 美英谴责中国冲撞和水炮损坏菲律宾船只的行为

The Philippines' foreign ministry said on Tuesday it has summoned China's ambassador to Manila to protest "back-to-back harassments" in the South China Sea at the weekend, as longstanding geopolitical tensions continue in the strategic waterway.翻译:菲律宾外交部周二表示，已召见中国驻马尼拉大使，抗议周末在南海发生的“接连骚扰”，因为这条战略航道长期存在的地缘政治紧张局势仍在继续。

Manila has asked China to direct its vessels to cease and desist from what it said were illegal actions and dangerous manoeuvres against Philippine vessels, and stop interfering in legitimate Philippine activities, the ministry said in a statement.翻译:菲律宾外交部在一份声明中表示，马尼拉已要求中国指示其船只停止针对菲律宾船只的非法行动和危险动作，并停止干预菲律宾的合法活动。

Foreign Affairs Undersecretary Ma. Theresa Lazaro verbally delivered the protest against the Chinese manoeuvres that led to a collision, and against use of water cannons against Philippine vessels sending supplies to troops stationed in an ageing warship at the Second Thomas Shoal.翻译:外交部副部长马.特蕾莎·拉扎罗口头抗议中国的演习导致了撞船事件，并反对使用高压水枪攻击菲律宾船只，这些船只向驻扎在仁爱礁的一艘老化军舰上的部队运送物资。

"The actions of the Chinese vessels within the Philippine exclusive economic zone are illegal and violate the freedom of navigation," the ministry said.翻译:外交部表示：“中国船只在菲律宾专属经济区内的行为是非法的，侵犯了航行自由。”

It also protested China's use of water cannons against three fisheries bureau vessels on their way to send oil and groceries to fishermen near the Scarborough shoal.翻译:它还抗议中国使用高压水枪袭击三艘渔业局船只，这些船只正在向黄岩岛附近的渔民运送石油和杂货。

The Chinese embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

The two neighbours traded accusations on Sunday, and the Philippines called China's actions a "serious escalation".翻译:这两个邻国周日互相指责，菲律宾称中国的行为“ 严重升级”。

China's foreign ministry protested over what it said was a collision on Sunday, but the Philippines said Chinese coastguard and maritime militia repeatedly fired water cannons at its resupply boats, causing "serious engine damage" to one, and "deliberately" ramming another.翻译:中国外交部对周日发生的相撞事件提出抗议，但菲律宾表示，中国海警和海上民兵多次向其补给船发射高压水枪，造成一艘补给船“发动机严重损坏”，并“故意”撞击另一艘补给船。

The United States, the Philippines' treaty ally, and the United Kingdom, both expressed support for the Philippines and condemned the actions of China, which claims sovereignty over almost the entire South China Sea, a conduit for more than $3 trillion of annual ship-borne commerce.翻译:菲律宾的条约盟友美国和英国都表示支持菲律宾，并谴责中国的行为。中国声称对几乎整个南海拥有主权，南海是每年价值超过 3 万亿美元的船只的通道。承载商业。

The Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, Malaysia and Brunei, have competing claims. The Permanent Court of Arbitration in 2016 said China's claims had no legal basis.翻译:菲律宾、越南、印度尼西亚、马来西亚和文莱都有相互竞争的主权主张。常设仲裁法院2016年表示，中国的主张没有法律依据。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales and Karen Lema; Editing by Martin Petty, Kanupriya Kapoor and翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯和凯伦·勒马报道；编辑：Martin Petty、Kanupriya Kapoor 和
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 北京智库称儿童是中国最好的投资
item.description:
Children are the most worthy investment for China's economy to help stimulate consumption and expand domestic demand a Beijing policy institute said, after the country posted its first population drop in more than six decades last year.翻译:北京政策研究所表示，在中国去年出现六十多年来人口首次下降后，儿童是中国经济最有价值的投资，有助于刺激消费和扩大内需。

China, the world's second-largest economy, has struggled to mount a strong post-pandemic recovery and any decline in its future workforce and consumer demand could have a profound impact on its economy.翻译:作为世界第二大经济体，中国一直在努力实现疫情后的强劲复苏，未来劳动力和消费者需求的任何下降都可能对其经济产生深远影响。

"In the current Chinese economy, children are the best investment. Infrastructure investment is becoming saturated, manufacturing has overcapacity ... but investment in the number of children is not enough," said the policy paper by the Yuwa Population Research institute published on Tuesday.翻译:友和人口研究所周二发布的政策文件称，“当前中国经济中，孩子是最好的投资。基础设施投资趋于饱和，制造业产能过剩……但对孩子数量的投资还不够。” 。

The paper urged authorities to "urgently" reverse a rapid decline in the number of newborns.翻译:该报敦促当局“紧急”扭转新生儿数量迅速下降的趋势。

China's advantage will shrink in the future as the young population shrinks rapidly, while economic measures such as cutting interest rates, activating the capital market and optimising real estate regulation have not helped to bolster economic growth and the recovery remains weak, it said.翻译:报告称，未来中国的优势将缩小，因为年轻人口迅速萎缩，而降息、激活资本市场、优化房地产调控等经济措施对提振经济增长无助益，复苏依然疲软。

In order to boost the economy, the Yuwa report recommended that maternity subsidies be distributed at a national level rather than by local governments and targeted measures be implemented to reduce the large cost of childbearing and rearing.翻译:为了提振经济，友和报告建议生育补贴应由国家层面而不是地方政府来分配，并采取有针对性的措施，降低生育和抚养的巨额成本。

Local governments have announced a series of measures to help lower childcare costs in recent years but many policies翻译:近年来，地方政府出台了一系列降低托儿费用的措施，但不少政策

have not been implemented or remain on paper due to insufficient funding and lack of motivation by local governments, it said翻译:报告称，由于资金不足和地方政府缺乏动力，尚未落实或停留在纸面上。

"Nowadays people are unwilling to get married and have children ... Because the cost of childbearing is too high, the difficulty for women to balance family and work, the average fertility willingness of Chinese people is almost the lowest in the world."翻译:“现在人们不愿意结婚生子……因为生育成本太高，女性难以平衡家庭和工作，中国人的平均生育意愿几乎是全世界最低的。”

Current subsidies are still insufficient, lower than most European countries it said.翻译:目前的补贴仍然不足，低于大多数欧洲国家的水平。

China reported a drop of roughly 850,000 people for a population of 1.41175 billion in 2022, marking the first decline since 1961, the last year of China's Great Famine.翻译:中国报告称，2022年人口将达到14.1175亿，减少约85万人，这是自1961年（中国大饥荒的最后一年）以来的首次下降。

Reporting by Farah Master and the Biejing newsroom; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:Farah Master和北京新闻编辑室报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 2024年中国落后市场的投资者将采取防御策略
item.description:
Investors in Chinese stocks next year will be seeking out businesses with global reach or other insulation from an economic downturn, after three straight years of China underperforming world markets.翻译:在中国连续三年落后于世界市场之后，明年中国股票的投资者将寻找具有全球影响力或其他免受经济衰退影响的企业。

Companies in defensive sectors such as health, medical innovation and exporters in the electric vehicles supply chain and advanced manufacturing, as well as multinationals such as e-commerce firm PDD Holdings (PDD.O), will top the list.翻译:健康、医疗创新等防御性行业的公司以及电动汽车供应链和先进制造业的出口商，以及电子商务公司 PDD Holdings (PDD.O)等跨国公司将名列榜首。

That's despite sell-side analysts turning bullish on China's broader market for next year, with Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs forecasting Chinese equities to outperform the S&P 500.翻译:尽管卖方分析师转而看好明年中国更广泛的市场，摩根士丹利和高盛预测中国股市将跑赢标准普尔 500 指数。

"Since economic recovery is slower than expected, we lowered exposures which are sensitive to macro cycles," said Wang Qing, chairman at Shanghai Chongyang Investment Management.翻译:上海重阳投资管理有限公司董事长王庆表示，“由于经济复苏慢于预期，我们降低了对宏观周期敏感的风险敞口。”

Chongyang is instead buying defensive high-dividend stocks, medical innovators with global competitiveness, and advanced manufacturing backed by Beijing, Wang said, declining to list any investments by name.翻译:王表示，重阳转而购买防御性高股息股票、具有全球竞争力的医疗创新公司以及北京支持的先进制造业，但他拒绝透露任何投资的名称。

This follows China's blue chip CSI300 index (.CSI300) sinking to five-year lows and losing 12% over 2023 against a 15% gain for global stocks (.MIWD00000PUS) as the Chinese economy struggled with a property crunch and a slow recovery from COVID-19.翻译:在此之前，中国蓝筹股沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)跌至五年低点，并在 2023 年下跌 12%，而全球股市(.MIWD00000PUS)则上涨 15%，原因是中国经济因房地产紧缩和从新冠疫情中缓慢复苏而苦苦挣扎。 -19。

Hong Kong's Hang Seng (.HSI) fared even worse, sliding more than 18% to trade on a forward price-to-earnings ratio below six, against 21 for the S&P 500 (.SPX).翻译:香港恒生指数(.HSI)的表现更糟，下跌超过 18%，远期市盈率低于 6，而标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)则为 21。

Performance over the last 10 months crushed the optimism that infused the beginning of the year, with four straight months of foreign outflows in the second half of the year totalling a net 138 billion yuan ($19 billion) withdrawn from Chinese equities via the Stock Connect scheme.翻译:过去 10 个月的表现粉碎了年初的乐观情绪，下半年外资连续四个月通过沪港通计划从中国股市净撤资达 1,380 亿元人民币（合 190 亿美元） 。

"Investors (have) struggled to think what the next growth driver for China will be," said Caroline Yu Maurer, head of China and specialised Asia strategies at HSBC Asset Management.翻译:汇丰资产管理公司中国及亚洲专业策略主管卡罗琳·于毛雷尔(Caroline Yu Maurer)表示：“投资者一直在努力思考中国的下一个增长动力是什么。”

Goldman analysts target 4,200 for the CSI300 (.CSI300) by the end of 2024, up 23% from Monday's close at 3,419. Morgan Stanley forecasts the blue chip index at 3,850 at the end of next year and the Hang Seng (.HSI) - which finished Monday at 16,201 - at 18,500, up 14%.翻译:高盛分析师的目标是到 2024 年底沪深 300 指数(.CSI300) 达到4,200 点，较周一收盘价 3,419 点上涨 23%。摩根士丹利预计蓝筹股指数到明年年底将达到 3,850 点，而恒生指数(.HSI)周一收于 16,201 点，预计将上涨 14% 至 18,500 点。

In contrast, Goldman sees the S&P 500 (.SPX) up less than 2% from current levels to 4,700 by the end of next year. Morgan Stanley sees it falling to 4,500.

EXPORTERS AND MULTINATIONALS

Real estate is casting the longest shadow. The sector that once accounted for a quarter of China's economy is reeling from a series of developer failures and a crisis of confidence that fund managers want to see resolved before they commit capital.翻译:房地产业的阴影最为深远。这个曾经占中国经济四分之一的行业正因一系列开发商倒闭和信心危机而陷入困境，基金经理希望在投入资金之前解决这些问题。

Moody's slapped a downgrade warning on China's credit rating last week, in part due to the property malaise. Shares of Country Garden (2007.HK), once China's biggest private property developer and now battling to service its debt, are down 73% this year.翻译:穆迪上周对中国信用评级发出下调警告，部分原因是房地产市场低迷。碧桂园（2007.HK）曾经是中国最大的私营房地产开发商，目前正在努力偿还债务，今年其股价已下跌 73%。

The Hang Seng index of mainland developers (.HSMPI) is down 44%.翻译:内地开发商恒生指数(.HSMPI)下跌 44%。

With the property shock ricocheting through the economy and dampened consumption, Morgan Stanley estimates the number of MSCI China companies missing analyst earnings expectations in the third quarter was the most since 2018.翻译:随着房地产冲击波及经济并抑制消费，摩根士丹利估计第三季度未达到分析师盈利预期的 MSCI 中国公司数量为 2018 年以来最多。

New York hedge fund Indus Capital Partners is among several investors turning away from exposure to China's domestic demand.翻译:纽约对冲基金 Indus Capital Partners 是几家放弃投资中国内需的投资者之一。

We see value in "some exporters and multinationals, and cheap (state-owned enterprises) aligned with and otherwise not of great concern to the government," said Indus partner John Pinkel, without naming specific companies.翻译:Indus 合伙人约翰·平克尔 (John Pinkel) 表示，我们看到了“一些出口商和跨国公司以及与政府结盟的廉价企业（国有企业）的价值”，但他没有透露具体公司的名称。

The stock of PDD, which owns U.S.-based shopping app Temu, for example, is up 75%. Discount retailer Miniso (9896.HK) also has a global footprint and its shares are up 80% this year.翻译:例如，拥有美国购物应用 Temu 的拼多多 (PDD) 的股价上涨了 75%。折扣零售商名创优品（9896.HK）的足迹也遍布全球，今年其股价上涨了80%。

Global asset manager Invesco is overweight on Chinese assets in its Asian portfolios, and strategist David Chao highlighted the attractiveness of global expansion, citing the success of Japanese companies abroad while growth slowed at home.翻译:全球资产管理公司景顺(Invesco)在其亚洲投资组合中增持了中国资产，策略师赵大伟(David Chao)强调了全球扩张的吸引力，理由是日本公司在海外取得了成功，而国内增长却放缓了。

To be sure, there are bargain hunters.翻译:可以肯定的是，有一些讨价还价的人。

Wenli Zheng, a portfolio manager at T. Rowe Price, says shipmakers have record orderbooks and the timing is ideal to buy good but perceived economically sensitive companies that are trading cheaply, such as Kanzhun (2076.HK), a recruiter, or mall operator China Resources Mixc Lifestyle (1209.HK).翻译:T. Rowe Price的投资组合经理郑文丽表示，造船商的订单量创历史新高，现在是买入价格便宜但被认为对经济敏感的优质公司的理想时机，例如招聘公司或购物中心运营商看准（2076.HK）华润万象生活（1209.HK） 。

Jefferies said it has turned "tactically positive" on China given an appreciating yuan and cheap valuations, and LSEG data shows sellside analysts think Chinese firms will see their strongest earnings expansion in seven years in 2024.翻译:杰富瑞 (Jefferies) 表示，鉴于人民币升值和估值低廉，该公司已对中国采取“策略上的积极态度”，伦敦证交所 (LSEG) 数据显示， 卖方分析师认为，中国企业将在 2024 年实现七年来最强劲的盈利扩张。

Yet BofA Securities' November survey of 265 Asia fund managers found a majority are either waiting for improvement or looking elsewhere, suggesting no rush to add to their exposure to China.翻译:然而，美国银行证券公司 11 月份对 265 名亚洲基金经理的调查发现，大多数人要么等待改善，要么寻找其他地方，这表明他们并不急于增加在中国的投资。

($1 = 7.1872 yuan)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.1872 元)

Reporting by Summer Zhen; Additional reporting by Samuel Shen in Shanghai; Editing by Tom Westbrook and Tom Hogue翻译:夏震报道； Samuel Shen 在上海的补充报道；汤姆·威斯布鲁克和汤姆·霍格编辑
